
\color{red}

``` {r c4, fig.cap="C4 Fork Graph", echo = FALSE}
knitr::include_graphics("./images/c4.png")
```

\begin{eqnarray}
\text{freq} & = & 0.2 \cdot 19.5 \\
            & = & 3.9 \\
            & = & \frac{39}{1000} \\
            & = & 0.0039 \\
            & = & \frac{1}{0.0039} \\
            & = & 256.41
\end{eqnarray}

See Figure \ref{fig:c4} for image.

**Frequency:** 256.41 Hz \par
**Expected Frequency:** 
**Percent Error: ** 0.2\%
